summary_points: 1. On April 17, 2025, Fidelity National Information Services, Inc. (FIS) agreed to acquire Global Payments Inc.'s Issuer Solutions business for an enterprise value of $13.5 billion, partly funded by an $8 billion bridge loan.
2. FIS expects to receive approximately $6.6 billion (pre-tax) from the concurrent sale of its Worldpay equity interests to Global Payments.

3. The closing of the transaction is contingent upon regulatory approvals in the U.S. and other jurisdictions, and is expected to be completed by April 16, 2026, subject to possible 6-month extensions.
